mdRecord.dcterms:title: Team Disney - The Michael D. Eisner Building, exterior|detail view
Seven Dwarfs Building
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Graves, Michael (American architect, born 1934) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Dopey caryatid at apex of pediment, with Doc caryatid below

The Team Disney structure is sometimes called the "Seven Dwarfs Building". It has large sculpted caryatids of the Seven Dwarfs holding up the roof of the eastern façade, an homage to the animated film Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs, which provided Walt Disney with the revenue to purchase the Burbank lot. Each statue is 19 feet (5.7 meters) tall, with the exception of the 2/3-sized Dopey at top. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Walt_Disney_Studios_(Burbank) [work]
